Definition at line 1218 of file zdo.h.

Field Documentation

void(* ZDO_SetTxPowerReq_t::ZDO_SetTxPowerConf)(ZDO_SetTxPowerConf_t *conf)

The function called to confirm the request. Must not be set to NULL.

Transmitter power to be set (dBm). Valid range is hardware-dependent: for AT86RF230 RF part, it is from 0xEF to 0x03 (-17 to 3). For AT86RF212 RF part, it is from 0xF5 to 0x0B (-11 to 11).

Definition at line 1223 of file zdo.h.
